channel.title: I think I speak for everbody.. (read inside.)
channel.description:
I think I speak for everybody when I say I think "can i b adman?" is spam. I think this is unacceptable and should be marked as spam. Mod taharok cleared these forums of spam. Yet we still see "cna I b aidmn?".
CM/ Global Mods/ Mopar, We should/are we aloud to report these post.?
Also are we aloud to post these posts as spam?
Also I didn't see a "Moparscape Statements" Forum so I posted here. Also are we aloud to post these posts as spam?

item.title: I think I speak for everbody.. (read inside.)

item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Thats dumb!!! Just report them for spam if its in the wrong section

Read full topic
